3: After defeating the enemies, we quickly ran up the stairs and went through many battle scenes that didn't really match the background settings.
These scenes have nothing to do with our main plot!
I guess Celica only had access to these materials. We're lucky that we aren't stuck. When I watched Kamui play other games...

2: You are always talking about Kamui.
4: Who's better at playing games, you or Kamui?

3: Ahem... Not at all. I just happen to inherit all the game-related topics from his memory!
Isn't it obvious? I will never lose to that fool in anything.
Eventually, we jumped across a staircase (broken for no reason) and arrived at a special room.
I have been watching you since you approached the castle... You took a long time to get here, heroes.
Apart from some enemies that we previously encountered, there was one figure that gave a very different feel.
Hey, you are the Demon General, aren't you?
Vera and Camu were ready to start fighting, but Karenina walked forward and triggered the dialogue.
It wasn't because she liked to follow orders, but because she preferred to ask the enemies' names before beating them.
Either way, the enemy would still be beaten up, but at least it felt better than straight-forward violence.
Right. I am Demon General Zanzibaron.
Zanzibaron—I had no clue where that name came from—moved one step forward, dragging his gigantic body.
You must be the heroes in the revelation. I knew you were coming, but I didn't expect you to come so fast.

4: Did you know we were coming since the beginning?

3: How can you be heroes but not know the legend of the revelation? How did you even get here?
Because we skipped the story.
In the Goddess' revelation, there would be heroes...
Aye, we Demons rely on our perception to survive...
'Survive'? You say it like you are on the brink of extinction.
Right, because...
Stop. I wasn't interested in your story, and I will not listen to it. Learning your name is more than enough!
Well, Karenina was only following her own rules. She forced to start the battle when Zanzibaron was still trying to explain the background settings.
Fusion Dragon smashed on Zanzibaron's face like a giant club.
Camu, are sneak attacks like that allowed in the game?
'I don't see any problems. That looked like a compulsory battle to me. 【kuroname】, we are about to engage in multiple battles. I assume you will give orders, right?'

2: I thought you didn't need me.

3: We can easily tackle the minions, but Boss fight can be very demanding. You do the thinking, we do the action.
Hmph, good to know. It's a Boss after all, we need all the available resources!
Let's do it then!
